section.p: You step into the darkness. It is much colder here, a marrowfreezing, bitter, biting cold that reaches into your chest with talons of frosty iron and squeezes your heart.

p.if: You must have a lantern or candle to proceed, otherwise it is too dark and you must turn back - .

section.p: If you have a light source available, you press on into a maze of tunnels.
